name: CAMediaTimingFunction
desc: A function that defines the pacing of an animation as a timing curve.

items.name: init(name: CAMediaTimingFunctionName)
items.desc: Creates and returns a new instance of CAMediaTimingFunction configured with the predefined timing function specified by name.

items.name: init(controlPoints: Float, Float, Float, Float)
items.desc: Returns an initialized timing function modeled as a cubic BÃ©zier curve using the specified control points.

items.name: func getControlPoint(at: Int, values: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>)
items.desc: Returns the control point for the specified index.
